entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Point Lepreau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:06 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Point Lepreau 12:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -4.3°C
Wind: WNW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning in the evening then changing to rain at times heavy before morning. Fog spreading inland before morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow or rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Snow or rain. Windy. High 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
